notes: Complete Vue 3 + TypeScript project implementing all features from input_ui_spec.txt. The project includes all 6 specified pages plus a 404 page, global navigation with active highlighting, region-based filtering with global state management using Pinia, responsive design for all screen sizes, and comprehensive accessibility features. Mock data includes 10 historical timeline items, 12 traditions (4 per region), and 8 celebration events with full cultural descriptions. TypeScript strict mode is enabled with no 'any' usage. All routes are lazy-loaded for optimal performance.
